title: Whoogle LXC
textContent:
Whoogle LXC 
                Get Google search results, but without any ads, javascript, AMP links, cookies, or IP address
                    tracking.
                
                To create a new Proxmox VE Whoogle LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell. 
                    To Update Whoogle, run the command below (or type update) in the LXC Console.
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/whoogle.sh)"
                ⚡ Default Settings: 512MiB RAM - 2GB Storage - 1vCPU ⚡
                Whoogle Interface: IP:5000
outerHTML:
Whoogle LXC

Get Google search results, but without any ads, javascript, AMP links, cookies, or IP address tracking.

To create a new Proxmox VE Whoogle LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
To Update Whoogle, run the command below (or type update) in the LXC Console.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/whoogle.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 512MiB RAM - 2GB Storage - 1vCPU ⚡

Whoogle Interface: IP:5000
